title: Batman - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/12/21
itunes:title: Batman - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/12/21
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and pop culture historian Arlen Schumer discuss the famous Batman television show that debuted in 1966, how the series was created, and how the campy style of the show differed from the classic comic books.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: An exploration into the classic 60s TV show featuring the Caped Crusader and the Boy Wonder.
